metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert 3 'AA' batteries into the battery compartment with correct polarity
2. The Smoke Detector will emit a 2-tone beep and LED will start flashing
3. Wait for the 6-minute warming period to complete
4. Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
5. The Smoke Detector will emit a 2-tone beep and LED will turn on briefly
6. Wait for calibration to complete (2-16 minutes) - indicated by 2-tone beep and LED turning off
metadata.exclusion: Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Smoke Detector will be removed from the Z-wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Test Button for 8 seconds.
